entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:43 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 5:49 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: W 27 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to flurries near midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 70 early this evening then northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
